Alignment 3 (lawful)

None

A ninja:

  • has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso.
  • can eat corpses and fruits.
  • is not a valid polymorphable form.
  • is a human.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • is strong.
  • can pick up weapons and food.
  • can be seen through infravision.

fields.name: Nutrition
fields.tip: The amount of nutrition you get for eating the corpse. V indicates a vegetarian corpse, V! indicates a vegan one.

fields.name: Initial effects
fields.tip: Effect applied upon eating the first bite

fields.name: Final effects
fields.tip: Effect that occurs upon finishing a corpse

fields.name: Intrinsics
fields.tip: Intrinsic that can be gained by eating this corpse

rows.Name: Chromatic Dragon
rows.Intrinsics: Fire: 17%, Cold: 17%, Sleep: 17%, Shock: 17%, Poison: 17%, Disintegration: 17%

fields.name: Command
fields.tip: M-<some key> means use the meta key, this is probably alt. Some commands, the ones that are just words, can be executed by entering #<some command>

fields.name: Description
fields.tip: A command dexcription, searching these is useful if you don't know the command!

rows.Name: help
rows.Description: display one of several informative texts

rows.Name: quit
rows.Description: end the game without saving current game

rows.Name: save
rows.Description: save the game (to be continued later) and exit

rows.Name: suspend
rows.Description: suspend the game (independent of your current suspend char)

rows.Name: whatis
rows.Description: tell what a map symbol represents

rows.Name: known
rows.Description: display list of what's been discovered

rows.Name: explore
rows.Description: switch the game to explore (discovery) mode

rows.Name: again
rows.Description: redo the previous command (^A denotes the keystroke CTRL-A)

rows.Name: prevmsg
rows.Description: repeat previous message (subsequent ^P's repeat earlier ones)
introduces an extended command (#? for a list of them)

rows.Name: apply
rows.Description: apply or use a tool (pick-axe, key, camera, etc.)

rows.Name: call
rows.Description: name an individual monster (ex. baptize your dog)

rows.Name: drop
rows.Description: drop an object.  d7a:  drop seven items of object 'a'

rows.Name: engrave
rows.Description: write a message in the dust on the floor  (E-  use fingers)

rows.Name: fight
rows.Description: followed by direction, fight a monster

rows.Name: invent
rows.Description: list your inventory (all objects you are carrying)

rows.Name: Invent
rows.Description:
list selected parts of your inventory
					Iu: list unpaid objects
					Ix: list unpaid but used up items
					I$: count your money

rows.Name: puton
rows.Description: put on an accessory (ring, amulet, etc)

rows.Name: search
rows.Description: search for secret doors, hidden traps and monsters
ask for current items of specified symbol in use
ask for combination of ),[,=,",( all at once

rows.Name: spells
rows.Description: list the spells you know; also rearrange them if desired

rows.Name: travel
rows.Description: move via a shortest-path algorithm to a point on the map

rows.Name: pickup
rows.Description: pick up all you can carry
toggle "pickup" (auto pickup) option on and off

rows.Name: farlook
rows.Description: look at what is somewhere else by selecting a map symbol
list which challenges you have adhered to.
loot a box on the floor.
name an item or type of object.
offer a sacrifice to the gods.
pray to the gods for help.
rub a lamp or a stone.
list compile time options for this version of NetHack.
get this list of extended commands.
followed by number of times to repeat the next command

rows.Description: name an item or type of object
